00160             function                process_colorbox( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00161             {
00162                   try
00163                   {
00164                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
00165                               $ProcessingString , 'colorbox' , array( 'selector' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; 
00166                         )
00167                         {
00168                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00169                               
00170                               $TemplatePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/colorbox.tpl';
00171                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplatePath );
00172                               
00173                               $Selector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' );
00174                               $Template = str_replace( '{selector}' , $Selector , $Template );
00175                               
00176                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{colorbox:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $ProcessingString );
00177                               $Changed = true;
00178                         }
00179                         
00180                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00181                   }
00182                   catch( Exception $e )
00183                   {
00184                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00185                   }
00186             }
00187             
00218             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00219             {
00220                   try
00221                   {
00222                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_colorbox( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00223                         
00224                         return( $ProcessingString );
